title: Complementary medicine search strategy for CENTRAL
cleaned_text: The following Cochrane Library via Wiley translation of the CAM on PubMed search strategy was developed in 2015 by Tamara Rader and updated in 2017 by Becky Skidmore. To adapt this strategy to the Cochrane Library, including CENTRAL, and make it appropriate for an international audience, appropriate word variations, standardized field labels, and gaps in coverage of emerging CAM concepts were addressed. The search strategy is current as of March 2017. Suggested Citation: Cochrane Library via Wiley (including Cochrane CENTRAL) translation of the CAM on PubMed Search Strategy [Internet].
